item.title: Re: Suggestion MX0 permanent items
item.content:encoded:
250 mission is not high as you think in one day you can do about 15 missions (without votes/potions) so in a 15-18 days you can get it.
p.s: it supose to be a long run mission and not a mission you can get in 1-2 weeks.

item.title: Re: Suggestion MX0 permanent items
item.content:encoded: also very few people go 250 times to D rank mission. i think that 100 times would be better

item.title: Re: Suggestion MX0 permanent items
item.content:encoded: The mission number might be a bit too high for some. 150-174 might be better. 200 at the most.

item.title: Re: Suggestion MX0 permanent items
item.content:encoded: Interesting, but the last upgrade should be range, not successes. Successes are mostly worthless in all but a few cases.

item.title: Suggestion MX0 permanent items
item.content:encoded:
i read a lot about mx0 manga and i start making a version of d20 of mx0 when i start playing this game and that give me an idea of new permanent item the magic plate .
so the idea is simple you will need number of missions and to make a special mission to obtain the magic plate and can improve it quality by doing more mission and test yourself by making a special mission

for example:
Special mission – does magic exist?
Requirements: 250 D Rank missions
Success: Red Iron magic plate (+1 level)

Special mission - improve the magic
Requirements: 250 C Rank missions, special jounin
Success: Bronze plate (+1 level, +1 strength), replace red iron magic plate

Special mission – choice of magic
Requirements: 250 B Rank missions, jounin
Mission 1: Those who emphasize on consistency
Mission 2: Those who emphasize on spells
Mission 3: Those who dont use spells but have strong magic
Success: Gold magic plate (+1 level/strength/range) ), replace bronze magic plate

Special mission – Top of the art
Requirement: 250 A Rank missions, 25 S missions
Success: Black layer gold magic plate (+1 level/strength/range/success).
